import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import {toast} from 'react-toastify'; export default function ProductDetail({cartItems, setCartItems}) { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const [qty, setQty] = useState(1); const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/product/'+id) .then(res => res.json()) .then( res => setProduct(res.product)) },[]) return product &&

{product.name}

Product #{product._id}

${product.price}

- +

Status: 0 ?'text-success':'text-danger'}>{product.stock > 0 ?'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}

Description:

{product.description}

Sold by: {product.seller}

}
